concept.title: Process Overview
concept.shortdesc: The WebHelp Responsive plugin is a DITA-OT plugin that allows you to transform a DITA based documentation to HTML format.

conbody.p: WebHelp Responsive plugin inherits the multi-stage processing mode from the DITA-OT publishing engine. Each stage in the process examines some or all of the content; some stages result in temporary files that are used by later steps, while others stages result in updated copies of the DITA content. Most of the processing takes place in a temporary working directory; the source files themselves are never modified.
The steps involved by the WebHelp Responsive transformation are:

p.note: The webhelp Responsive plugin uses the XSLT stylesheets from the DITA-OT XHTML plugin.
